comment: The main text block containing the content of the page from '说文解字' (Shuowen Jiezi), including headings, character entries, definitions, and annotations. The text is arranged in vertical columns, typical of traditional Chinese printing. It includes the title '說文解字第亖下 漢太尉祭酒許慎記', followed by character entries such as '丹', '彤', '贋', etc., with their meanings, phonetic readings, and structural components.
